item.title: When KBD drops claws it announces to every one on server Code, wuts wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

TO SKIt: That’s not the point i want it for the item drop not to announce that it’s dead!
(ignore every one else)

To Every one else:

temp yell works for this server i tested it with this code under, if i change the line of code to:

}
if(npcs.npcType == 50) {
temp.yell(“Some one killed the kbd!”);
}

Then it works fine and is great! and tempyell works fine. but this is the error i get when i add the monster drop :[

item.title: When KBD drops claws it announces to every one on server Code, wuts wrong?
item.dc:creator: @sk1ttlezrule43v sk1ttlezrule43v
item.description:
@sk1ttlezrule43v wrote:

[quote=“Michaelmmm, post:1, topic:281414”]}
if(npcs.npcType == 50 && npcdrop == 8002) {
temp.yell(“Some one killed the kbd and got claws!”);
}

why isnt this working can u help correct it??

NOTE: the point of this is to, when the kbd dies, and “IF” it drops claws it will ::yell it to everybody on the server.
also if there is a chance u can rewrite it id appreciate it!
thank you :][/quote]

Everytime the KBD is killed, It will say that. Now I don’t know how to changed it to only say that ‘when’ it drops claws. But I wold change it to something like ‘The king black dragon has died’. Something reasonable.
